title: The Tree of life
creator_credit: Gerard De Boe, Harold Cooper and Lintas Film Unit
brief_description: The discovery, harvesting and preparation of palm oil in the Belgian Congo. Something of the history of the industry, the concession given to Lever Bros by King Leopold and the transportation difficulties in penetrating the interior of the Congo are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Gerard De Boe, Harold Cooper and Lintas Film Unit
